meanings.definition: A removable cover for a piece of furniture, typically made of fabric.
meanings.sent1: I bought new slipcovers for my sofa to protect it from spills.
meanings.sent2: The slipcovers on the chairs matched the curtains in the room.
meanings.sent3: The slipcovers on the couch were so colorful, they looked like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Her slipcovers were like magic cloaks, transforming the old furniture into something new.
meanings.sent5: The slipcovers were like a shield, guarding the sofa from wear and tear.

meanings.sent1: She slipcovers her chairs every season to give them a fresh look.
meanings.sent2: I slipcovers the old armchair to make it match the new decor.
meanings.sent3: He slipcovers the entire room in bright colors, making it look like a circus!
meanings.sent4: The artist slipcovers the sculptures in fabric, creating a surreal display.
meanings.sent5: The decorator slipcovers the walls with fabric, turning the room into a cozy nest.
